text: Ra timiharu tyasa samayala'i yadagara jaba allaha timisita vaca garirakheko thiyo ki du'i samuhaharumadhye e'uta timro hathama a'unecha ra timi cahanthyaum ki nihsastra samuha timro hatama a'os. Ra allaha yo cahanthyo ki aphno adesako satyata pramanita garos ra ti inkara garneharuko jara katide'os
